name: Modern Living Room
description: A sleek, modern living room design with minimalist furniture and neutral tones.

name: Scandinavian Kitchen
description: A Scandinavian-style kitchen featuring natural wood finishes and open shelving.

name: Rustic Dining Room
description: A cozy dining room with a rustic table, reclaimed wood beams, and warm lighting.

name: Classic Bedroom
description: A classic bedroom design with elegant furniture and a neutral color palette.

name: Industrial Loft
description: An industrial-style loft with exposed brick walls, metal accents, and open spaces.

name: Mid-Century Modern Office
description: A functional yet stylish office space with mid-century modern furniture and bold colors.

name: Bohemian Patio
description: A colorful and eclectic patio space with patterned cushions, hanging plants, and rugs.

name: Minimalist Bathroom
description: A clean and serene minimalist bathroom with white tiles, sleek fixtures, and ample natural light.
